tha-ap320:0.3_0: Hearing this, the most senior monk deserving of praise.
tha-ap320:1.1_0: “Who created this bag of bones as
tha-ap320:1.4_0: He threw out the stone in a mountain.
tha-ap320:3.4_0: peaceful, to the world and the next.
tha-ap320:4.4_0: The Buddha shines in the world.
tha-ap320:5.2_0: and I’m freed from the great sage,
tha-ap320:5.3_0: For the purpose of the Buddha,
tha-ap320:5.4_0: He rejoices in heaven for an eon.
tha-ap320:6.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap320:8.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap320:9.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kāsi.
